name: Generals
description:
Create your undefeatable army and unleash it against other players in quick uncontrollable battles! Discover the best strategies and become the best general in the world!

Features:
● Collect the best units and create unbeatable army!
● Fight against the armies of other players to see who is the smartest general!
● Discover different tactics and strategies!
● Earn trophies and climb the leaderboards to become the best general in the world!
